name: Carson Valley Inn & Casino

faqs.question: What golf courses are near Carson Valley Inn?
faqs.answer: Genoa Lakes Golf Club, Dayton Valley Golf Club, and Toiyabe Golf Club are all within 15-25 minutes.

faqs.question: Is this a good base for Carson Valley golf?
faqs.answer: Excellent — it's the primary lodging option in Carson Valley with affordable rooms and casino entertainment.
